column4: Hello , I need help please , i installed (by compiling) package named "IRSTLM" (its a tool for processing text for statical use.. ) after i compiled the source files i got msg : Set IRSTLM environment variable with path to irstlm " how can i do that ?
edit the .bashrc or .bash_profile   and use teh command 'export IRSTLM='/path/to/the/thing'
bash basics. :) that will set ot up when the user logs in.  or theres system wide configs for the same thing also.
that file gets read at login, so it  wont take effect  unless you reread/source the file.
